Reviews.Title: “Decent in DF”
Reviews.Author: elainers
Reviews.Content: ok dont compare mexico city staff nice minus particular lady thats front desk afternoon found duty night speaks english reservation messed move twice 5 days deal windows fans musty quickly single actually shared balcony overlook street noisy smell little sewage outside windows provide noise insolation bathrooms clean smell pork restaurant downstairs carpet kinda grosses location near food options 2 metro stops location clean safe overall budget choice

Reviews.Title: “Solid Budget Choice”
Reviews.Author: susanmex
Reviews.Content: ive stayed hotel washington times location outstanding block street juice bar canada feet cafe el popular la blanca late night eats clean tiny bathrooms towels bedding recently upgraded city midst renovating colonial facade frills bargain price

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Washington
HotelInfo.Address: Av Cinco De Mayo No 54, Mexico City 06000, Mexico
